players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is lying, I don't think he's innocent."
Bob: "I am the Mafioso, and I killed Diana last night. Charlie, you should reconsider your accusation."
You: "Bob is lying, I don't think he's innocent. Charlie said that before me and his statement was more convincing than mine. He also didn't accuse me of being the Mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
